T02D1782:280a-1: tsanda ma h'a ro sha n'a bhi sa ma ya /
T02D1782:280a-3: gtum chen drag po'i mngon par rtogs pa /
T02D1782:280a-4: bla ma dang dpal gtum po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1782:280a-5: dpal gtum chen drag po bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1782:280a-6: dang por re zhig yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i
T02D1782:280a-7: dben pa'i gnas 'ga' zhig tu thog mar bde ba'i
T02D1782:280a-8: stan la nye bar 'dug nas ral gri'i phyag rgya
T02D1782:280a-9: bcings te / snying ga dang mdzod spu dang mgrin
T02D1782:280a-10: pa dang spyi bo rnams su lan gsum bzhag la
T02D1782:280a-11: bcings te / / na ma: sarb'a sh'a pa ri
T02D1782:280a-12: p'u ra ge bhya: sarba th'a ga te bhya: sarba
T02D1782:280a-14: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02D1782:280a-15: sarba bighn'am dzny'a na khatga h'um phat ces brjod do //
T02D1782:280b-0: @280b de la ral gri'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D1782:280b-1: mdzub mo dang gung mo drang por byas la ming med dang mthe'u chung mthe bong gis mnan pa'o //
T02D1782:280b-2: des phyogs bcur 'khyam pa'i bgegs rnams drungs phyung bar blta'o //
T02D1782:280b-3: de nas spyi bor bzung nas mu: yig gis gshegs su gsol nas /
T02D1782:280b-4: aom a'a:h'um zhes bya ba dag spyi bo dang mgrin
T02D1782:280b-5: pa dang snying gar bsams la lag pa g-yon gyis
T02D1782:280b-6: reg nas lan gsum brjod do //
T02D1782:280b-7: de bzhin du spyi bor aom ma ni dha ri
T02D1782:280b-8: badzri ni ma h'a pra ti sa ra raksha raksha
T02D1782:280b-9: m'am h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes brjod do
T02D1782:280b-10: // aom a'a:badzra sa ne h'um zhes pas stan byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1782:280b-11: de dag gis bsrung ba byas nas /
T02D1782:280b-12: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du nyi ma rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02D1782:280b-13: de'i steng du 'od zer dang bcas pa'i h'um yig bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1782:280b-14: de nas 'od zer des lus rnam par sbyangs nas /
T02D1782:280b-15: 'og min gyi mthar thug pa'i sa gsum po khyab par byas la /
T02D1782:280b-16: de dag na bzhugs pa'i dpal gtum chen drag po spyan drangs nas mdun gyi nam mkhar bltas te /
T02D1782:280b-17: 'od zer me tog la sogs pa'i gzugs su bsgoms
T02D1782:280b-18: nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil sngon du 'gro ba'i
T02D1782:280b-19: mchod pa bya'o // bla na med pa'i mchod pa ni rnam pa bdun yin te /
T02D1782:280b-20: 'di ltar bdag gis sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi'o //
T02D1782:280b-21: skye bo gzhan dag gis dge ba la mchog tu dga' bas rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D1782:280b-22: bcom ldan 'das zhugs pa'i don gyi phyir dang /
T02D1782:280b-23: dam pa'i chos dkon mchog gnas par bya ba'i slad du /
T02D1782:280b-24: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1782:280b-25: byang chub kyi rgya mtsho yid la byas nas /
T02D1782:280b-27: dge ba'i cho gas byang chub kyi ched du 'jug par bgyi'o zhes bya ba 'dis so //
T02D1782:280b-28: de las bcom ldan 'das thugs dgyes pas legs so
T02D1782:280b-29: zhes bya ba gnang nas sgrub po dbugs 'byin par
T02D1782:280b-30: mdzad do // de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag
T02D1782:280b-31: byas nas bzod par gsol te rang gi gnas su
T02D1782:280b-32: mdzad do // gshegs par blta'o // de nas aom
T02D1782:280b-33: sv'a bh'a wa shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sv'a bh'a wa shuddhonyaham
T02D1782:280b-34: mdzad do // gshegs par blta'o // / aom sh'u
T02D1782:280b-35: n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma konyaham
T02D1782:281a-0: mdzad do // gshegs par blta'o // / / zhes bya ba 'di dag gis don @281a * //
T02D1782:281a-1: mngon du byas la stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1782:281a-2: dang por byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms bsgom par bya zhing /
T02D1782:281a-3: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'gyur bar shog / ces bya ba'i smon lam yang btab nas so //
T02D1782:281a-4: de nas stong pa nyid sgom pa'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1782:281a-5: brtan pa dang g-yo ba rnams sa bon la gzhug la /
T02D1782:281a-6: bdag nyid kyang zla ba dang nyi ma la /
T02D1782:281a-7: zla ba dang nyi ma dag kyang h'um la /
T02D1782:281a-10: mgo bo yang zla tshes la /
T02D1782:281a-11: zla tshes kyang thig le la /
T02D1782:281a-12: thig le yang n'a da la /
T02D1782:281a-13: n'a da ni nam mkha' la thim ste /
T02D1782:281a-14: de nas cung zad kyang rtog par mi bya'o //
T02D1782:281a-15: de la 'dis skad cig dang por gnas nas /
T02D1782:281a-16: smon lam dran pa sngon du 'gro bas rtsa dmar ba'i chos kyi 'byung gnas /
T02D1782:281a-17: de'i dbus su aa yig dang re pha las skyes
T02D1782:281a-18: pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D1782:281a-19: du h'um sngon po rtsa dmar ba'i 'od zer can
T02D1782:281a-20: bsams nas / zla ba la sogs pa 'dres shing
T02D1782:281a-21: dngul chu'i rnam pa de yongs su gyur ba'i dpal
T02D1782:281a-22: gtum chen drag po sngon po rtsa dmar ba'i 'od
T02D1782:281a-23: bsams nas / zer can / yon por lta ba /
T02D1782:281a-25: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i phyag dag gis zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang /
T02D1782:281a-27: / stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D1782:281a-28: rus sbal gyi stabs kyis bzhugs pa /
T02D1782:281a-29: zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa /
T02D1782:281a-31: gzhon nu sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1782:281a-32: shin tu mkhrang pa'i sku snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i spyan gnyis rtsa dmar ba /
T02D1782:281a-33: rin po che'i cod pan can bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1782:281a-34: shar la sogs pa'i rim pas /
T02D1782:281a-35: spyan ma dkar mo padma dkar po 'dzin pa /
T02D1782:281a-36: m'a ma k'i sngon mo rdo rje 'dzin pa /
T02D1782:281a-37: dkar mo dmar mo padma dmar po 'dzin pa /
T02D1782:281a-38: sgrol ma ljang gu autpala sngon po 'dzin pa rnams so //
T02D1782:281a-39: 'di dag ni rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D1782:281a-40: sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1782:281a-41: lo bcu drug lon pa'i nyams can /
T02D1782:281a-42: g-yas pa dag mchog sbyin par mdzad pa ste /
T02D1782:281a-43: chos 'byung ba'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das lta bur
T02D1782:281a-44: zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bsam
T02D1782:281a-45: mo // de nas rang gi lus las 'od zer
T02D1782:281b-0: dmar po @281b rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D1782:281b-1: sems dpa' dang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo spyan drangs
T02D1782:281b-2: mo // la / dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D1782:281b-3: aa bhi shinytsantu m'am sarba ta th'a ga ta zhes pas so //
T02D1782:281b-4: de rnams kyis bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D1782:281b-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a bhi she ka sa
T02D1782:281b-6: ma ya shri ye h'um zhes bya ba 'dis so
T02D1782:281b-7: // de nas dbang bskur ba'i chus khru ba na
T02D1782:281b-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma yang dag
T02D1782:281b-9: par 'phags te bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud nas dam
T02D1782:281b-10: // du 'tshir zhing / sku mdog dang gzugs shin tu dmar ba dang ldan pa /
T02D1782:281b-11: lo bcu drug gi phyed kyi na tshod gcer bu sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1782:281b-12: g-yon pas padma dkar po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1782:281b-13: de nas de dang de rtse bar bya ste /
T02D1782:281b-14: de las nam mkha' la rda po che'i sgra grag go //
T02D1782:281b-15: gur kum la sogs pa'i char 'bab po //
T02D1782:281b-16: de nas de ni bcom ldan 'das dpal gtum byed
T02D1782:281b-17: drag po rnal 'byor ma lnga'i 'dren pa'o zhes bya
T02D1782:281b-18: ba 'dis ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa ji
T02D1782:281b-19: sring du nga rgyal bar bya'o //
T02D1782:281b-20: skyo na de'i nga rgyal gyis sngags bgrang bar bya ste /
T02D1782:281b-21: sngags ni aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D1782:281b-22: ji tsam 'dod pa'i nges pa mthar son pa na /
T02D1782:281b-23: aom badzra satva sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /
T02D1782:281b-24: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02D1782:281b-27: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D1782:281b-29: sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shre ya: ku ru
T02D1782:281b-30: h'um ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga w'an sarba
T02D1782:281b-31: ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa /
T02D1782:281b-33: ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a: zhes brjod nas /
T02D1782:281b-34: lha'i nga rgyal gyis ji tsam 'dod par gnas par bya'o //
T02D1782:281b-35: 'dis thun gsum ma mthun bzhir bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1782:281b-36: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1782:281b-37: rnam par dag pa phyi rol du srung ba ni bgegs nyams pa'i ched du'o //
T02D1782:281b-38: mchod pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs so //
T02D1782:281b-39: stong pa nyid ni ye shes kyi tshogs so //
T02D1782:281b-40: lha'i gzugs ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
T02D1782:281b-41: lha mo bzhi ni tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'o //
T02D1782:281b-42: shes rab ma ni rang bzhin yin no //
T02D1782:281b-43: nang du 'od gsal ba ni 'chi ba'o //
T02D1782:281b-44: chos 'byung ni bha ga dang zla ba dang nyi ma ni khu ba dang /
T02D1782:282a-0: khrag dang sngags ni bar srid kyi sems dang dngul chu'i rnam pa ni nur nur po @282a * //
T02D1782:282a-1: dang mer mer po dang mkhrang 'gyur dang nar nar
T02D1782:282a-2: po rnams kyi rang bzhin du yongs su gyur ba'o
T02D1782:282a-3: // rgyan dang bcas par 'gyur ba ni rkang lag 'gyus pa'o //
T02D1782:282a-4: lha mo bzhi ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ngo //
T02D1782:282a-5: thams cad kyi bsam du med pa'i gzugs ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o //
T02D1782:282a-6: de la 'di dag ni thams cad kyi sangs rgyas
T02D1782:282a-7: nyid du gyur pa kho na'o zhes bya ba yin
T02D1782:282a-8: te / 'on kyang ma rig pa dang nyon mongs pas dbang byas pa yin no //
T02D1782:282a-9: sems can sgrol ba'i phyir zung du 'jug pa nyid ni sdigs mdzub yin la /
T02D1782:282a-10: ral gris ni ma rig pa 'joms la zhags pas ni nyon mongs pa 'joms pa yin no //
T02D1782:282a-11: zla ba dang nyi ma ni dngos po dang dngos
T02D1782:282a-12: po med pa las 'das nas chos 'byung gi zhing
T02D1782:282a-13: du byams pa chen po'i khro bor bzhugs so //
T02D1782:282a-15: de nas sngon du bsnyen pa'i don du 'bum bzla bar bya ste /
T02D1782:282a-16: nag po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te /
T02D1782:282a-17: zla ba nya'i bar du bsgom zhing sum 'gyur du bzla bar bya ste /
T02D1782:282a-18: nyi ma so sor stong phrag bcu rnams so //
T02D1782:282a-19: nya'i nyin mo yongs su gyur pa'i mthar ji ltar
T02D1782:282a-20: nus pas mchod pa byas nas gtor ma phul te
T02D1782:282a-21: / dben par mtshan thog thag ji srid nyi ma
T02D1782:282a-22: 'char ba'i bar du bzla bar bya'o zhes pa ni
T02D1782:282a-23: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1782:282a-24: gtor ma'i snod aa yig gis padma'i snod du bsams nas /
T02D1782:282a-25: der gnas pa lha'i bdud rtsir bltas shing /
T02D1782:282a-26: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na ai dam ba
T02D1782:282a-27: lim grihna grihna ma ma sarba siddham ku ru h'um
T02D1782:282a-28: phat kyis lan bdun du mngon par bsngags nas bcom
T02D1782:282a-29: ldan 'das pa la gtor ma dbul lo zhes pa
T02D1782:282a-31: de nas sngon du bsnyen pa'i mthar rgyal la /
T02D1782:282a-33: grub pa'i shing las byas pa yang rung ste /
T02D1782:282a-34: ral gri'i rnam pa mthe bo'i sor gyi tshad la
T02D1782:282a-35: me tog phreng bas nye bar mdzes pa'i rnam lnga
T02D1782:282a-36: dang dri thams cad kyis bkrus la /
T02D1782:282a-37: ras bris yang dag par brtsams pa'i sku gzugs kyi
T02D1782:282a-38: mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
T02D1782:282a-40: gtor ma dang mchod pa rgya chen po phul nas
T02D1782:282a-41: nya'i nyin la lag pa gnyis kas bzung nas bzla
T02D1782:282a-42: ba gcig tu bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1782:282a-43: de nas nya'i nyin mo rdzogs nas mtshan thog thag bzla'o //
T02D1782:282b-0: de nas 'bar ba'am gsal bar gyur na @282b de
T02D1782:282b-1: nas nyi ma 'char pa na de grub par te
T02D1782:282b-2: / sha'i bza' btung spangs nas so //
T02D1782:282b-3: 'ga' zhig skra 'khril ba lo bcu drug gi rnam
T02D1782:282b-4: pa can nam mkha' la 'gro zhing lo stong phrag
T02D1782:282b-5: bcu rnams su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni
T02D1782:282b-6: ral gri'i dngos grub kyi cho ga'o //
T02D1782:282b-7: de nas dgra bo rims kyis 'debs par 'dod na /
T02D1782:282b-11: dzva ra dzva ra la ya dzva la ya /
T02D1782:282b-12: shosha ya sho sha ya grihna grihna dzva la dzva
T02D1782:282b-13: la aom tsanda mah'a ro sha na h'um phat sv'a
T02D1782:282b-15: dur khrod kyi ras la dug dang skye tshes bsgrub
T02D1782:282b-16: bya sor brgyad pa'i tshad du bris nas phreng ba'i
T02D1782:282b-18: phyi nas spra tshil gyi nang du gzugs brnyan bcug
T02D1782:282b-19: la yang bse shing gi nang du gzhug par bya'o
T02D1782:282b-20: // aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na che ge
T02D1782:282b-21: mo la dzva ri na grihna pa ya h'um phat
T02D1782:282b-22: // / sngags 'di dag yongs su bzla zhing dur
T02D1782:282b-23: khrod kyi me la gdungs na rims kyis 'debs par
T02D1782:282b-24: 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med do //
T02D1782:282b-25: aom bi kri t'a na na pa ra ba la bhanydza ne bhanydza ya /
T02D1782:282b-26: stam bha ya stam bha ya badzra p'a she na bandha bandha h'um phat ga /
T02D1782:282b-27: kha: kha: kha: ha h'a hi h'i phem aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D1782:282b-28: sngags 'di dag gro ga la ba bla dang yung
T02D1782:282b-29: bas bris nas spra tshil gyis btums nas ling+g'i nang
T02D1782:282b-30: du bcug la yang lag brgyad la phur bus btab
T02D1782:282b-31: ste / gzugs brnyan kha 'og tu bstan nas dong du gzhug go //
T02D1782:282b-32: 'di dag gis ni dmag lhags pa la phur bus btab par 'gyur ro //
T02D1782:282b-33: aom dza ya dza ya pa r'a dza ya ni
T02D1782:282b-34: rja ta yantre h'i h'i h'a h'a sphota ya spho
T02D1782:282b-35: ta ya autsh'a da ya autsh'a da ya sh'i ghram
T02D1782:282b-36: marmam ku ru ku ru aom tsanda ma h'a ro
T02D1782:282b-38: sngags 'di dag dur khrod kyi ras la bris nas
T02D1782:282b-39: srad bu sngon pos dkris te dpud [*dpung?] par bcings
T02D1782:282b-40: nas pha rol gyi 'khrul 'khor 'joms par byed do
T02D1782:282b-41: // aom ae tsa le sanytsa la kri la ya h'um phat /
T02D1782:282b-42: spra tshil gyi ling+ga sor bzhi'i tshad byas la /
T02D1782:282b-43: gro ga la bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa ba blas bris nas de'i khar bcug la /
T02D1782:282b-44: de nas phur bus btab ste lam bzhi mdor dong
T02D1782:282b-45: du bcug na phas kyi rgol ba'i kha la phur
T02D1782:282b-47: aom sarba m'a ra bhanydza ni h'um phat /
T02D1782:282b-48: sngar bshad pa'i cho gas bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel ba byas nas /
T02D1782:282b-49: rkang pa dag la phur bus btab na 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rengs par byed do //
T02D1782:283a-0: aom santa sa ne mo h'a na ya @283a * //
T02D1782:283a-1: h'um phat sngags 'di spyi bor bcings nas srung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1782:283a-2: aom ya ma marda ne marda ya marda ya aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D1782:283a-3: ces pa ni sdig pa'i nad sel pa'i sngags so //
T02D1782:283a-4: aom kro dha ne kro sha ne bhe da n'a
T02D1782:283a-5: ya h'um phat ces pa ni zug rdu sel ba'i
T02D1782:283a-6: sngags so // aom ya m'anta ka hri: shtri h'um h'um phat /
T02D1782:283a-7: aom tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya tsanda pra tsanda h'um phat /
T02D1782:283a-8: ces brjod na ma he 'bros so //
T02D1782:283a-9: aom hi li phu: phu: zhes brjod na sbrul 'bros so //
T02D1782:283a-10: mamma mam'a gri dhi ni kh'a hi bisha tsa ru
T02D1782:283a-11: gvi ni kha kha kha ha ha sa: sa: tsanda
T02D1782:283a-12: ma h'a se n'a dzny'a pa ya te sv'a h'a
T02D1782:283a-13: / aom sam k'a ri ni dhvam h'i h'um ha: zhes pa ni mkha' lding gi sngags te /
T02D1782:283a-14: stong phrag bcus grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1782:283a-15: aom sbetk'a ra phem phem ha ha ha h'a h'a
T02D1782:283a-16: phat ces pa ni dur khrod du rtse bar byed
T02D1782:283a-17: pa'i sngags so // aom sarba bi dy'a dhi pa
T02D1782:283a-18: ta ye pa ra yantra n'a sha na sarba d'a
T02D1782:283a-19: ki n'i n'am tr'a sa ya bandha bandha mu kham
T02D1782:283a-20: k'i la ya k'i la ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D1782:283a-21: ces pa ni grong khyer dang zhing du 'jug pa'i sngags so //
T02D1782:283a-22: yang bya rog khrag blangs nas zangs ma'i glegs bu la sngags bri zhing /
T02D1782:283a-23: gang gi ming yin pa de nyid kyi bshad bar
T02D1782:283a-24: btums te bya rog gis zos na blo dman yang
T02D1782:283a-25: mi g-yo ba'i sngags kyi sbyor ba las te /
T02D1782:283a-26: aom k'a ka ku ta ni kra ba ni sv'a h'a /
T02D1782:283a-27: che ge mo k'a ke na ban ksh'a pa la
T02D1782:283a-28: tsanda ma h'a se n'a dzny'a pa ya ti h'um
T02D1782:283a-29: phat / ces pa'i sngags bya rog gi mig gis bris nas /
T02D1782:283a-30: dur khrod kyi gos sngon por btsos pas gzugs brnyan sor bcu drug pa dril te /
T02D1782:283a-31: dur khrod du dbyug pa la bcings shing /
T02D1782:283a-32: cog pu'i 'dug stangs kyis dur khrod du mtshan thog thag bzla'o //
T02D1782:283a-33: de mthong na pha rol gyi sde rengs par 'gyur la /
T02D1782:283a-35: 'di'i phye mas lus dang rkang pa la byugs na rgyug par mi nus shing brgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1782:283a-37: aom a'a kaddhya a'a kaddhya mo ha ya che ge mo ba shi ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1782:283a-38: lto ba'i srin bu blangs nas phye mas zhib bar byas te /
T02D1782:283a-39: 'od dpag med dang ming med kyi khrag dang lhan
T02D1782:283a-40: cig ril bu byas nas sngar bshad pa'i sngags kyis
T02D1782:283a-42: bza' ba dang btung bar byin na /
T02D1782:283a-43: gal te na nga rgyal dang dregs pas bsnyems pa'i
T02D1782:283a-44: mi mo dbang du 'gyur ba la the tshom med
T02D1782:283a-45: de / ma shi'i bar du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1782:283b-0: 'di dag thams cad ni bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid @283b can kho nas grub par 'gyur te /
T02D1782:283b-2: de nas dbang du bya ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D1782:283b-3: 'phur bzhin pa'i sprang ma'i gshog pa gnyis dang /
T02D1782:283b-5: ro'i me tog phreng bas te /
T02D1782:283b-6: dbang du bya ba la sngar rengs pa la bshad pa'i sku mdog ser por bsgom mo //
T02D1782:283b-7: bskrad pa la du ba'i mdog dang bsad pa la mdog nag po'o //
T02D1782:283b-8: las gzhan dang gzhan la nye bar gnas pa dang dgrol ba sngon por bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1782:283b-9: las thams cad mi g-yo ba la rim pas gus
T02D1782:283b-10: shing bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can gyis rgyal po lta
T02D1782:283b-11: bur spyod do // aom dzv'a l'a ka r'a la
T02D1782:283b-12: ba da ne ha sa ha sa ha la ha
T02D1782:283b-13: bur spyod do // la / badzre su badzre spha
T02D1782:283b-14: ra spha ra spha ra ya spha ra ya sarba
T02D1782:283b-15: me gha ta bhi ta bhishtam stvambha ya stvambha ya
T02D1782:283b-16: spho ta ya spho ta ya ya: ya: sarba p'a
T02D1782:283b-17: n'i yam sho sha ya h'um phat /
T02D1782:283b-18: sngags 'di bzlas nas kun du bltas na rlung dang sprin 'thor bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1782:283b-19: de nas 'dir bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i slad du mchod pa'i mandala bshad par bya ste /
T02D1782:283b-20: de la dang por kha la sogs pa dag par byas nas /
T02D1782:283b-21: aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni ma h'a pra
T02D1782:283b-22: ti sa re raksha raksha m'am h'um h'um h'um phat
T02D1782:283b-23: sv'a h'a / zhes pa ni srung ba'i sngags so //
T02D1782:283b-24: aom hri: sv'a h'a zhes pa 'di lag pa dang rkang pa bkru ba dang /
T02D1782:283b-26: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a bhi she ka sa
T02D1782:283b-27: ma ya shri ye h'um zhes pa ni khrus kyi
T02D1782:283b-28: sngags so // de bzhin du 'dis gtsang mar gyur
T02D1782:283b-29: ba'i me tog byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags kyis me
T02D1782:283b-30: tog byin gyis brlab pa'i ched du me tog gcig
T02D1782:283b-32: ba byung gi chus zla ba lta bur mandala bya'o //
T02D1782:283b-33: aom sarba bighn'an autsh'a ra h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1782:283b-35: aom badzra re khe h'um zhes pa 'dis kyang ngo //
T02D1782:283b-36: de nas a'a re kha sarba ta th'a ga t'a tishthantu sv'a h'a /
T02D1782:283b-37: zhes pa 'dis me tog phul te /
T02D1782:283b-39: de nas dbus su ri rab dang /
T02D1782:283b-40: shar du lus 'phags la sogs pa bsam zhing /
T02D1782:283b-41: 'di steng du h'um yig yongs su gyur pa'i dpal gtum chen drag po /
T02D1782:283b-43: rnams yongs su gyur pas lha mo lngas yongs su bskor ba'i phreng ba rnam par bsams la /
T02D1782:283b-44: thog ma med pa nas grub pa rnams spyan drangs nas de la bcug ste /
T02D1782:283b-45: bcings shing dgyes par bya ba ni dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba 'di dag gis so //
T02D1782:284a-1: sogs pas mchod par bya ste /
T02D1782:284a-2: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na pushpam pra t'itstsha h'um phat /
T02D1782:284a-3: aom lo tsa ni pushpe pra t'itstsham lam sv'a h'a /
T02D1782:284a-4: m'a ma k'i la sogs pa rnams la yang de bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1782:284a-10: dza la la sogs pa rnams la rig par bya'o //
T02D1782:284a-11: de nas ral gri'i phyag rgyas dgyes par bya zhing bstod nas phyag byas te /
T02D1782:284a-12: yid kyi rang bzhin gyis mchod pa bya zhing /
T02D1782:284a-13: rnam pa bdun dang bzla na med pa'i mchod pa yang byas te /
T02D1782:284a-14: slar yang phyag byas nas bzod par gsol te /
T02D1782:284a-15: tshul khrims tsandan gyis byugs lus //
T02D1782:284a-16: bsam gtan gyi ni gos bgos shing //
T02D1782:284a-17: byang chub yan lag me tog bkram //
T02D1782:284a-18: ji ltar bde bar dgyes par mdzod //
T02D1782:284a-19: slar yang bdag la brtse ba yis //
T02D1782:284a-21: aom mu:mu: sv'a h'a zhes chu gtsang me tog dang bcas pa zhabs la dbul lo //
T02D1782:284a-22: de nas mchod pa bsdus nas gshegs so snyam du bsgom zhing /
T02D1782:284a-23: de nas dri ma med cing dben par dor bar bya'o //
T02D1782:284a-24: de nas gtsang mar gyur nas ci bder bya'o //
T02D1782:284a-25: aom hr'am hr'im hrom tsanda r'u pe tsa ta tsa
T02D1782:284a-26: ta pra tsa ta ka ha ka ha pra spha
T02D1782:284a-27: ra / pra spha ra ya ha na ha na gra sa gra sa bandha bandha /
T02D1782:284a-28: dzambha ya dzambha ya stambha ya satambha ya mo ha
T02D1782:284a-29: ya sarba sha tr'um mu kham bandha nam ku ru
T02D1782:284a-30: ku ru sarba d'a ki n'i n'am gra ha bh'u
T02D1782:284a-31: ta pi sh'a tsa by'a dhi yaksha n'am tr'a sa
T02D1782:284a-32: ya tr'a sa ya ma ra ma ra m'a ra
T02D1782:284a-33: ya m'a ra ya ru ru tsanda ku ka raksha
T02D1782:284a-34: raksha tsanda ma h'a se n'a sarba m'a dzny'a pa
T02D1782:284a-35: ya ti / aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D1782:284a-36: sngags 'di dag gro ga'i 'dab ma la padma 'dab
T02D1782:284a-37: ma bcu drug pa'i dbus su gur kum dang gi
T02D1782:284a-38: wang dang rgya skyegs kyis bris te srad bu nag
T02D1782:284a-40: mgrin par bcing bar bya'o zhes pa srung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1782:284a-41: yang kha lhor bltas nas yungs kar la brgya rtsa
T02D1782:284a-42: brgyad mngon par bsngags nas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs
T02D1782:284a-43: pas zin pa la brdeg par byas nas gtong bar
T02D1782:284a-44: 'gyur ro // yang na so rtsi'i 'dab ma la
T02D1782:284a-45: gru gsum pa gnyis kha sbyar ba'i dbus su tsher
T02D1782:284a-46: mas bris nas pho ba ris lnga dang lhan cig
T02D1782:284a-47: sbyar nas zos na nyin gcig pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1782:284a-49: aom tsanda ma h'a se n'a gra sa gra sa
T02D1782:284a-50: kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi shosha ya shosha ya
T02D1782:284a-51: m'ar ya m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02D1782:284b-0: myos byed kyi sor @284b bzhi pa'i tshad kyi gzugs
T02D1782:284b-1: brnyan byas nas de'i snying gar sngags 'di dag dur
T02D1782:284b-2: khrod kyi ras la dug dang skye tshes bris pa
T02D1782:284b-3: bcug ste / sor gcig pa'i tshad kyi rus pa'i phur bus gdab bar bya'o //
T02D1782:284b-4: dur khrod du khung bu brkos nas kha sbub tu
T02D1782:284b-5: bzhag na nyi ma bdun gyis 'chi ba bsgyur bar
T02D1782:284b-7: nim ba dang bya rog gi tshang blangs nas yi dags kyi me la bsregs ba'i thal ba la /
T02D1782:284b-8: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na che ge mo
T02D1782:284b-9: autstsha ta ya h'um ya h'um phat brgyad du rtsa
T02D1782:284b-10: brgyad du bsngags nas sgo la gtor na khyim nas
T02D1782:284b-11: skrod pa la the tshom med do //
T02D1782:284b-12: khyi 'thab pa'i sa de dag gi rkub nas blangs la /
T02D1782:284b-13: phan tshun sdang ba'i gzugs brnyan la 'thor na 'byed
T02D1782:284b-14: par byed pa la rnam par brtag mi dgos so
T02D1782:284b-16: aom dve sha ne dve sha badzre che ge mo
T02D1782:284b-17: pi dve sha ya aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha
T02D1782:284b-18: na h'um phat / ces pa dbye ba'o //
T02D1782:284b-19: gro ga la ba blas sor drug pa'i rus sbal
T02D1782:284b-20: bris nas rkang pa bzhi la h'um khar plim dbus
T02D1782:284b-21: kyi lto bar tam gnyis bris la /
T02D1782:284b-22: sgrub pa pos rgyab tu phreng ba'i sngags kyis phyi rol du bskor ba la /
T02D1782:284b-23: mchod pa dang bstod pa yang dag par brtsam zhing /
T02D1782:284b-24: so phag gi steng du bskor rus sbal gyi khog pas bkab ste /
T02D1782:284b-25: srad bu dmar pos dkris nas rkang pa phyis pa'i
T02D1782:284b-26: gos kyis btums te rkang pa g-yon pas brdeg par
T02D1782:284b-27: bya zhing / che ge mo ba sham bha bantu
T02D1782:284b-28: zhes pa lan bdun gyi mthar thug pas dgra bo
T02D1782:284b-29: thams cad kyi kha bcing bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1782:284b-30: de la phreng ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D1782:284b-31: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um hr'i hrom
T02D1782:284b-32: hri go ra r'u pe tsa ta tsa ta tsa
T02D1782:284b-33: pra tsa ta gha t'a gh'a t'a ya ka ha
T02D1782:284b-34: ka ha pra sphar pra spar ya pra spha ra
T02D1782:284b-35: ya k'i la ya k'i la ya dzambha dzambha ya
T02D1782:284b-36: stambha stambha ya mo ha ya mo ha ya h'um
T02D1782:284b-38: aom tsi li mi li la te h'um phat /
T02D1782:284b-39: ces pa mig nad zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so //
T02D1782:284b-40: aom tsd'a tsd'am tsdrum sho sha ya dh'a ram bandha
T02D1782:284b-41: bandha aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat
T02D1782:284b-42: / ces pa ba'i rus pa'i phur bu sor bdun
T02D1782:284b-43: pa'i tshad la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon bar bsngags nas
T02D1782:284b-44: ba lang lhas su barko sar bcug na 'om 'chad
T02D1782:284b-45: / par nges so // phyung na grol lo //
T02D1782:284b-46: aom badzri ni badzra p'a ta ya su ra pa
T02D1782:284b-47: ti r'a dzny'a pa ya ti dzva la ya ti
T02D1782:284b-48: dzv'a la ya dzv'a la ya dzv'a la ya aom
T02D1782:284b-49: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D1782:284b-50: mkhas pas grog mkhar gyi 'jim ba blangs nas rdo
T02D1782:284b-51: rjer byas la 'di nyid brgya rtsa brgyad bzla zhing
T02D1782:285a-2: des skad cig la rdo rje'i zong nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D1782:285a-3: aom raksha raksha sam ko tsa la ne pra tsa
T02D1782:285a-4: la ne pra tsa la pra tsa la ma h'a
T02D1782:285a-5: kro dha r'u pe pa tsa pa tsa ts'a la
T02D1782:285a-6: ya aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat
T02D1782:285a-7: ces pa nag bo'i brgyad dam bcu bzhi la dur
T02D1782:285a-8: khrod kyi thal ba la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par
T02D1782:285a-9: bsngags nas dgra'i khyim du gtor ro //
T02D1782:285a-10: yang sgor brkos nas gzugs brnyan gzhug ste /
T02D1782:285a-11: nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par byed do //
T02D1782:285a-12: de nas grong khyer bskyod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1782:285a-13: gro ga'i 'dab ma la gur gum gyi mdog lta bu phyag gnyis pa /
T02D1782:285a-14: zhags pa dang lcags kyu'i phyag chags pa dang gtsigs shing 'jigs su rung ba bri ste /
T02D1782:285a-15: glang po che'i chang dang rgya skyegs dang bud med kyi rdul dang /
T02D1782:285a-16: sv'a l'anta dang gur kum rnams kyi spel tshig dang bcas pa ste /
T02D1782:285a-17: sngags kyi yi ges lte ba dang /
T02D1782:285a-18: snying ga dang mgo bo rnams la'o //
T02D1782:285a-19: aom yig mgo bor sbyin bya ste /
T02D1782:285a-20: hr'im yig de bzhin snying ga la /
T02D1782:285a-21: de ltar lte bar krim yig go //
T02D1782:285a-22: mig la tram yig de bzhin no //
T02D1782:285a-23: phreng ba'i sngags kyis bskor nas srad bu dmar pos dkri'o //
T02D1782:285a-24: sngags ni aom hr'im kr'am tram ya ma tha ne
T02D1782:285a-25: a'a ka da ksho bha ya ksho bha ya sarba
T02D1782:285a-26: k'a ma pra s'a dha ne /
T02D1782:285a-27: hram hrem hrim ka ta ka ta sv'a h'a /
T02D1782:285a-28: thod pa kha sbyor du bcug nas mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang ste /
T02D1782:285a-29: srad bu dmar pos dkris nas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1782:285a-30: ro'i gnas su brkos par bcug la /
T02D1782:285a-31: rkang pa g-yon pas mnan nas sngags bzlas shing /
T02D1782:285a-32: yang mi rus dmar po la phreng ba bya zhing bsgom ste /
T02D1782:285a-33: sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pas stong phrag nyi shu
T02D1782:285a-34: rtsa lngas 'gyur ba la the tshom med do zhes
T02D1782:285a-35: pa grong khyer bskyod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1782:285a-36: phag gi tshil bu'i rtse mo la mar me sbar nas dga' ba spyad na zla bo 'ching do //
T02D1782:285a-37: aom sha ni'i rtsa ba dang /
T02D1782:285a-38: k'a m'a ts'i'i rtsa ba dang /
T02D1782:285a-39: gser shing gi sa bon dangs byar nas /
T02D1782:285a-40: ga pur dang lhan cig mnyes nas yan lag mchog
T02D1782:285a-41: la byugs te dga' ba spyad na khams 'ching ngo
T02D1782:285a-46: pi pi ling rnams cha mnyam par ma ksha ki dang sbrang sbyar nas zos na khams 'phel lo //
T02D1782:285a-47: ta ga ra'i rtsa ba su dar sha na dang
T02D1782:285a-48: mnyes nas mar dang lhan cig 'thungs shing byugs na
T02D1782:285b-0: pu tra dz'a r'i dang tsanda li @285b dang /
T02D1782:285b-1: ming med kyi khrag dang khu ba dang /
T02D1782:285b-2: lto ba'i srin bu phye mar byas nas bza' ba
T02D1782:285b-3: dang btung bar byin na bsgrub bya dbang du 'gyur
T02D1782:285b-4: ro // gtum chen drag po'i mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs so /
T02D1782:285b-6: // / pandi ta bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes bsgrigs pa'o //
